------

Synopses:

A video opera that profiles three major technological events of the 20th century: the explosion of the Hindenburg, the atomic test at Bikini Atoll, and the cloning of Dolly the sheep.

------

Reasons of piracy:

I saw this play live at CCB (Portuguese Cultural Center Belem), in Portugal, and I was astonished by the impact it caused me. It was a cultural impact. Pedagogy. I bought the original immediately after. I regained hope in intervention Cinema.

(Original DVD)
